name: The Maiden's Prayer
description: As tempted as I am to select a drink recipe this week related to Wednesday's post on fern bars, I'm just not gonna go there. Besides, if you really want a recipe for a Sex on the Beach or a Slippery Nipple, there are plenty of sources where you can satisfy that particular craving. Plus, you don't need to probe the mixological offerings of the leisure-suit era if you're looking for drinks with a lecherous wink in their makeup; for example, look no further than the Maiden's Prayer.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
